QuestData.Title: Recovering the Heart
QuestData.Description:
Darkness grasps the heart of Droman Krelnor, as he grasps the heart of the grove.
Anima drains from the heart, nectar taken from ripened fruit. It must be stopped.
Foul magic bars the way. Anima in peril, anima the salvation.
Beseech Te'zan. An old soul, brimming with anima, the spark to ignite our hope.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The droman of Heartwood Grove is possessed by these strange masks. He must be slain to save the grove's heart!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Te'zan to break down the droman's barrier, then confront Droman Krelnor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Niya within the Shrouded Mire.
QuestData.RewardText: We've lost so much. Why would anyone do this?
